characters.name: Hiryu Rin
characters.description:
**Height:** 170 cm (5'7")
__Quirk:__ Scales

He is a Class 1-B student in U.A. High School, training to become a Pro Hero. It's notable that Hiryu possesses a serious demeanor when it comes to playing out his abilities into action. He is rather diligent in terms of academic abilities and Quirk functions as well. Hiryu has shown to be a very competent combatant, with a great handle on the applications of his Quirk. Thanks to the versatile nature of his Scales Quirk, Hiryu excels in both close and long-range combat, effectively switching between hand-to-hand combat, and shooting off his scales when it’s most convenient to him.

characters.name: Reiko Yanagi
characters.description: Reiko is a quiet and emotionless teenager who often shows an odd body posture.

characters.name: Kojiro Bondo
characters.description: An easy going guy and described as a gentle giant.

characters.name: Melissa Shield
characters.description: Melissa is a Quirkless girl and the daughter of Scientist David Shield.

characters.name: Shikkui Makabe
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180cm
__Quirk:__ Stiffening

Second year student at Ketsubutsu Academy, his quirk, 'stiffening', allows him to harden objects with his hands by rubbing or kneading them

characters.name: Itejirou Touteki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 171cm
__Affiliation:__ Ketsubutsu Academy
__Quirk:__ Boomerang

A second year student at Ketsubutsu Academy. His Quirk, "Boomerang," allows him to plan the trajectory of any given object he can throw, including underground.

characters.name: Seiji Shishikura
characters.description: A second year student at Shiketsu High. His Quirk, "Meatball," allows him to roll all living flesh up into meatballs, as well as manipulate his own flesh to his liking. He can remotely control his own flesh after detaching it.

characters.name: Tatami Nakagame
characters.description:
__Height:__ 155cm
__Occupation:__ Student
__Affiliation:__ Ketsubutsu Academy
__Quirk:__ Telescopic

A second year student as Ketsubutsu Academy. Her Quirk, "Telescopic," allows her to fold her limbs into her body, similar to a turtle.

characters.name: Inko Midoriya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm (5'3'')

Izuku Midoriya's mother. Her quirk allows her to pull small objects towards her.

characters.name: Juuzou Moashi
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ Centipede: Juuzou's Quirk grants him long, centipede-like limbs, which he can use to attack or restrain enemies from afar.

Moashi is a sidekick affiliated with Sir Nighteye's Hero Office. Juuzou is a gentleman and a very well mannered person

characters.name: Ryuuko Tatsuma
characters.description: When she activates her Quirk, her body transforms into that of a large, winged dragon with pale gray scales, although she still has the same skin tone, hair and eyes, and her hero costume remains visible bar her boots.

characters.name: Ken Takagi
characters.description:
Quirk: Lock Down:/Ken can immobilize anything not living, locking it into a particular place. However, it can be overwhelmed by force and cannot apply to large areas.

Ken is a man of average height, with a darker complexion and dark, curly hair. He has pierced ears with padlocks in them. Notably, his fingertips have protrusions that resemble key teeth.
Part of his hero costume is a small white mask that covers his eyes. He wears a necklace around his neck with five keys dangling from it. Rock Lock wears a two-colored, short-sleeved shirt with a black section and a white print on it, resembling a keyhole. He wears two light-colored shoulder pads with a dark keyhole shape on both of them.

characters.name: Ectoplasm
characters.description:
__Height:__ 180 cm (5' 11")
__Affiliation:__ Yuuei
__Quirk:__ Clones

Ectoplasm has the ability to produce ectoplasm from his mouth and transform it into clones of himself. He can create up to thirty clones at once, and push his limit to thirty-six if he's feeling good. He can also produce a giant clone of himself, although this sacrifices his ability to produce normal-sized ones for the time being. His clones can be defeated with a strong blow, but otherwise, only Ectoplasm can dispel them.

characters.name: High End
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ League of Villains

High End Nomu was an intelligent Nomu created and is shown to be obedient to its master. They were one of the main antagonists in the Pro Hero Arc.

characters.name: Lunch Rush
characters.description: Lunch Rush is a Pro Hero and the Chef at the cafeteria of U.A. High School. He is known for his good cooking.

characters.name: Snipe
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ Homing

Snipe is a Pro Hero and a member of the teaching staff at U.A. High School. Snipe has the appearance of a stereotypical western cowboy

Snipe's Quirk allows him to lock on to any target he can see within six hundred meters and make any projectile he releases chase after said target

characters.name: Higari Maijima
characters.description: Higari Maijima, also known as the Excavation Hero: Power Loader, is a Pro Hero and faculty member at U.A. High School.

characters.name: Masaki Mizushima
characters.description:
__Height:__ 176 cm
__Occupation:__ Pro Hero

Masaki Mizushima, also known as Normal Hero: Manuais, is the current No. 222 Pro Hero. He is based out of Hosu City.

characters.name: Uwabami
characters.description: Uwabami is a Pro Hero.

characters.name: Yoichi Shigaraki
alt_names: First User of One For All (初代ワン・フォー・オール)
characters.description: All For One's younger brother.

characters.name: Kaina Tsutsumi
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ Rifle

A villain who used to be a Pro Hero.

Kaina Tsutsumi can protrude and retract a rifle from her right elbow, which she can fire bullets out of with a range of 3 kilometers. She can create and use different types of bullets by mixing and molding her hair, such as hollow-point bullets and curving bullets.

characters.name: Daigorou Banjou
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Pro Hero
__Quirk:__ Blackwhip; One For All (formerly)

The 5th user of One For All whose natural Quirk was Blackwhip. His Quirk allowed him to create tendrils of black energy from his arms, excellent for grappling and increasing his mobility.

characters.name: Masaru Bakugou
characters.description: Masaru Bakugou is Katsuki Bakugou's father and the husband of Mitsuki Bakugou.

characters.name: Mitsuki Bakugou
characters.description: Mitsuki Bakugou is Katsuki Bakugou's mother and the wife of Masaru Bakugou.

characters.name: Kenji Tsuragamae
characters.description: Kenji is the Chief of the Police Force.

characters.name: Kyoutoku Jirou
characters.description: Kyotoku Jiro is Kyoka Jiro's father.

characters.name: Sansa Tamakawa
characters.description: Sansa is a member in the Police Force.

characters.name: Aorio Kuraishisu
characters.description: Aorio Kuraishisu is a Hero Expert.

characters.name: Cider House Leader
alt_names: サイダーハウスリーダー
characters.description:
The leader of a gang of pickpockets who operated mainly during the holiday season, having studied the patterns and routes of hero and civilian activity in a specific street for a whole month, with the intent of maximizing profits from their looted items while facing minimal resistance.

He possesses a Quirk that allows him to control carbonated water. He also has connections with the black market, having acquired a pair of gauntlets provided by Detnerat that could convert his water blasts into gatling shots.

characters.name: Kotarou Shimura
characters.description: Kotarou Shimura was the father of [Tenko](https://anilist.co/character/89226/Tomura-Shigaraki) and Hana Shimura and the son of [Nana Shimura](https://anilist.co/character/126319/Nana-Shimura).

characters.name: Cathleen Bate
alt_names: キャスリーン・ベイト
Star and Stripe (スターアンドストライプ)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 193 cm
__Quirk:__ New Order

The current No. 1 Pro Hero of the United States of America. She is stated to be the strongest woman in the whole world. Cathleen's Quirk allows her to set a rule onto her surroundings, allowing her to manipulate and bestow new properties onto herself and the world around her. In order to activate her Quirk, she has to first make physical contact with the target and speak its name, then explains the rule she wishes to impose. She could only impose two rules at any given time.

characters.name: Shishido
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ Unknown Lion Quirk
__Occupation:__ Pro Hero

Current No. 13 Pro Hero

characters.name: Onima
characters.description: One of the many sidekicks who work at Endeavor's Agency.

characters.name: Untenmaru Kurumada
characters.description: Endeavor's chauffeur.

characters.name: Kidou
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Pro Hero (Sidekick)
__Affiliation:__ Endeavor Agency (Team Flaming Sidekickers)
__Quirk:__ Traject

One of many sidekicks who works at Endeavor's Agency. His Quirk allows him to manipulate the trajectory of anything that passes through his bandages.

characters.name: Crust
alt_names: Shield Hero Crust (シールドヒーロー クラスト)
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ Shield
__Occupation:__ Pro Hero (No.6)
__Fighting Style:__ Close-ranged combat

characters.name: Hana Shimura
characters.description: Hana was the older sister of [Tenko Shimura](https://anilist.co/character/89226/Tomura-Shigaraki) and granddaughter of [Nana Shimura](https://anilist.co/character/126319/Nana-Shimura). ~!She was killed by her brother when his Quirk went out of control!~

characters.name: Nao Shimura
characters.description: Nao was the wife of [Kotarou Shimura](https://anilist.co/character/251812/Kotarou-Shimura) and the mother of their two children, [Tenko](https://anilist.co/character/89226/Tomura-Shigaraki) and [Hana](https://anilist.co/character/290001/Hana-Shimura). ~!She died when her son's Quirk went out of control.!~

characters.name: Mika Jirou
characters.description: The mother of Kyoka Jiro.

characters.name: Enma Kannagi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm
__Occupation:__ Pro Hero
__Fighting Style:__ Long Range Support
__Quirk:__ Magic

Pro Hero. During U.A. High School's Work Studies II, he takes in [Creati](https://anilist.co/character/89241) and [Lizardy](https://anilist.co/character/149179). He is one of the heroes assigned to the Villa Raid Team led by Edgeshot.

characters.name: Hero Kouan Iinkai Kaichou
alt_names: ヒーロー公安委員会会長
characters.description: Head of the Hero Public Safety Commission which is in charge of the Hero Association in Japan. She tasked [Hawks](https://anilist.co/character/128299) to infiltrate the League of Villains in order to gather intel on the group and learn more on their current agenda.

characters.name: Tomie Takami
alt_names: Hawks no Haha (ホークスの母)
characters.description: Mother of [Keigo Takami](https://anilist.co/character/128299).

characters.name: Yoroi Musha
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ Unknown
__Occupation:__ Pro Hero ~!(Retired)!~

No. 9 Pro Hero. ~!He retired due to the high backlash against Heroes following the Paranormal Liberation War.!~

characters.name: Hikage Shinomori
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ Danger Sense; ~!One For All (formerly)!~

Hikage Shinomori was a valiant and noble man who was determined to defeat [All For One](https://anilist.co/character/125956). His Quirk, Danger Sense, allowed him to sense incoming threats in the surrounding area, giving him ample opportunity to react. ~!He was the fourth user of the One For All Quirk.!~

characters.name: En Tayutai
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ Smokescreen; ~!One For All (formerly)!~

En is a former Pro Hero. His Quirk, Smokescreen, allowed him to generate clouds of smoke which could obscure vision. ~!He was the sixth user of the One For All Quirk.!~

characters.name: Bruce Lee
alt_names: Sandaime One For All (三代目ワン・フォー・オール)
Third Generation One For All User
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ ~!Fa Jin; One For All (formerly)!~

The Third user of the One For All Quirk. He was part of the resistance fighting against All For One, alongside the second user. ~!Fa Jin, the Quirk he was born with, allows the user to build up kinetic energy by repeating regular motions and store it for later use. When the user chooses to release the energy, they gain an explosive burst of speed and power.!~

characters.name: Toshigtsugu Kudou
alt_names: Nidaime One For All (二代目ワン・フォー・オール)
Second Generation One For All User
characters.description:
__Quirk:__ ~!Gearshift; One For All (formerly)!~

The Second user of the One For All Quirk. He was the leader of a resistance movement who fought against All For One during the peak of his power. ~!Gearshift, the Quirk he was born with, allows the user to change the speed at which things accelerate through space. It is even capable of changing speeds while ignoring the laws of inertia.!~

characters.name: Ethan Drive
characters.description:
__Height:__ 190cm (6'3")

American fighter pilot, leader of his brigade, and ally of Star and Stripe. Ethan served in the U.S. Air Force as a new recruit alongside Cathleen Bate. She would eventually go on to become the Number 1 Hero in America, known as "Star and Stripe", with Ethan as her "Bravo Leader", commanding an army of air fleets to back her up. He is an expert pilot.

characters.name: Tajima
characters.description: One of several undercover spies sent by All For One to infiltrate U.A. High School.

characters.name: Kunieda
characters.description: Villain who was imprisoned in Tartarus for mass murder and corpse collecting. He escaped due to a prison riot caused by All For One before joining the latter's forces. He is known to collect those he kills and use their corpses as fertilizer for his Plant Quirk.

characters.name: Yuuyu Haya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160 cm

Third-year student in U.A. High School's Hero Course. She has an unnamed Electric Arrow quirk.

characters.name: Fuutou Nahashira
alt_names: ながしら ふうとう
characters.description: Student in U.A. High School's Business Course. Strongly influenced by Best Jeanist.

characters.name: Maina Furasu
characters.description: Student of U.A. High School's Support Course from Class 1-H. She is classmates with Mei Hatsume.

characters.name: Komari Ikoma
characters.description:
__Height:__ 157cm

School teacher at Masegaki Primary School. Komari is often exasperated by her students' near-constant rude antics, and describes them as being "problem children". She is very distressed, nearly to the point of crying, when they constantly ignore her instructions. However, after seeing her students behaving differently at the Provisional Hero License Course, she was inspired to not give up.

characters.name: Tamashiro
characters.description: Student from Masegaki Primary School.

characters.name: Ronaudo Keage
characters.description: Student of U.A. High School's Business Course.

characters.name: Josei Kisha
characters.description: Television news reporter.

characters.name: Dai
characters.description: Middle school student who desires to become a Pro Hero.

characters.name: Oboro Shirakumo
characters.description:
Oboro was a man of average stature with light, wavy hair that was swept back to flow upwards above his head, two shorter, ear-length tufts left hanging downwards to frame his face. He usually wore an expression of excitement, possessing a large, teeth-bearing grin and semicircular, inward-tilting eyes that were often squeezed shut.

Quirk: **Cloud** (he is capable of moving through the air by creating clouds and riding on them.)

(Source: My Hero Academia Wikia)

characters.name: Shiina
characters.description: The owner and director of the Oumagadoki Zoo. He is very tall and has the face of a rabbit. He was a human who was cursed by a magical rabbit. He now runs his zoo filling it with magical animals he finds, because if he finds enough of them, he can use their magic power to reverse the curse laid on him. Though not always the easiest to get along with, he sees the animals not as what they are, but rather as comrades.    Shiina is mostly known as the lunatic rabbit with no feelings for another, only when one of his friends are in danger. He shows his true love for animals when one of his friends is getting hurt or kidnapped most of the times or went in the trouble. Shiina doesn't listen to anyone, only to himself. Somehow his original body shows whenever he saves someone that is too close to him, which shows that the Ghost Rabbit gives him hints away to understand that, but he's a complete idiot that doesn't understand most of the things. In his childhood he was doing nonsense that causes him only trouble.

characters.name: Astro
characters.description:
__Height:__ 5'1"

He is a small, young man with wild blue hair and a fierce expression befitting his personality. Astro is a courageous young man of great determination and ambition who cares deeply about his friends and adoptive family. Having grown up without a family, he considers having a family to be very important and that families should get along no matter how unlikable one of their members are. He values his adoptive family more than anything and cannot stand to see orphans abandoned on the street and adopts every orphaned child he comes across and raises them as his siblings, doing the best he can to give them the life they deserve. He is also heroic and brave in nature and cannot stand idly by while others get hurt and will often recklessly leap into battle to take down foes. He can also be stubborn or childish at times and does not like taking orders from adults and will make certain mistakes. He also dislikes to show his more sensitive side and tends to hide his tears when around his family.

characters.name: Backdraft
characters.description: Backdraft is a pro hero. His quirk, Hydrokinesis, allows him to create and manipulate water through spigots that he has in place of hands. He is affiliated with Musutafu Fire Department

characters.name: Wedge
characters.description:
One of the fighter jet pilots loyal to [Star and Stripe](https://anilist.co/character/254809), accompanying her on her flight to Japan.

**His name is a reference to the Star Wars character Wedge Antilles, a renowned starfighter pilot.*

characters.name: Kouichi Haimawari
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172 cm (5'8")
__Occupation:__ Vigilante, ~!Pro Hero Sidekick!~
__Quirk:__ Slide and Glide (allows the user to project a repulsive force from their hands and feet)

Koichi has an easy-going, mild-mannered personality. He is very generous and does not seem to expect anything from other people in return. He dreams of being able to become a recognized hero and is shown to enjoy the vigilante work that he does. He is very willing to do the less glamorous jobs, such as cleaning up trash and does not seem to think that these are negative aspects of being a hero or vigilante. 

His costume consists of his regular clothes in conjunction with an All Might-haired hooded jacket, a black mask covering his face, red sunglasses, and protective bike gear.

Unbeknownst to Koichi, he and Kazuho share a history. Koichi had once saved Kazuho when she fell into a river. He would give the drenched Kazuho his limited edition All Might hoodie and run off to his entrance exam for a high school that specialized in superheroics. Because he chose to save her, Koichi ended up missing the exam and returning to his hometown.

~!After his battle against Number 6, he now possesses a scar on his left cheek, which he received from the villain shortly before his death. As "The Skycrawler", his hero costume is a blue full-body suit, akin to his traditional All Might hoodies and Number 6's "O'Clock II" costume, an updated version of his original gloves, and silver armored shoulder pads, also bearing a resemblance to Number 6's costume. He also wears a purple visor that resembles Captain Celebrity's, and has a utility belt over his waist with an "SC" on it.!~

(Source: Wikia)
